mapper.sql: TXL_ID, ZZJG_ID, TXL_NAME, TXL_EMAIL, TXL_DEPARTMENT, TXL_POSITION, TXL_PHONE, TXL_ADDTIME, TXL_DELFLAG
mapper.select: select DISTINCT TXL_DEPARTMENT, ZZJG_ID from TXL where ZZJG_ID = #{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select DISTINCT TXL_POSITION, ZZJG_ID from TXL where ZZJG_ID = #{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from TXL T where TXL_DELFLAG=1
and TXL_NAME like '%${keywords}%'
and ZZJG_ID = #{orderField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by T.TXL_ID desc ) as t1 order by TXL_ID asc) as t2 order by TXL_ADDTIME desc
mapper.insert: insert into TXL (TXL_ID, ZZJG_ID, TXL_NAME, TXL_EMAIL, TXL_DEPARTMENT, TXL_POSITION, TXL_ADDTIME, TXL_DELFLAG, TXL_PHONE) values (#{txlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txlEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txlDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txlPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txlAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{txlDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{txlPhone,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into TXL
TXL_ID,
ZZJG_ID,
TXL_NAME,
TXL_EMAIL,
TXL_DEPARTMENT,
TXL_POSITION,
TXL_ADDTIME,
TXL_DELFLAG,
TXL_PHONE,

mapper.update:
update TXL
ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXL_NAME = #{txlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXL_EMAIL = #{txlEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXL_DEPARTMENT = #{txlDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXL_POSITION = #{txlPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXL_ADDTIME = #{txlAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TXL_DELFLAG = #{txlDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
TXL_PHONE = #{txlPhone,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where TXL_ID = #{txlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TXL set ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXL_NAME = #{txlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXL_EMAIL = #{txlEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXL_DEPARTMENT = #{txlDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXL_POSITION = #{txlPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXL_ADDTIME = #{txlAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TXL_DELFLAG = #{txlDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TXL_PHONE = #{txlPhone,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where TXL_ID = #{txlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TXL set ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXL_NAME = #{txlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXL_EMAIL = #{txlEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXL_DEPARTMENT = #{txlDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXL_POSITION = #{txlPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXL_ADDTIME = #{txlAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TXL_DELFLAG = #{txlDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where TXL_ID = #{txlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
